title: Looking for coach to get out of bronze ! Will reward
body:
Hi guys I'm a terrible player and am looking for a coach to get me out of bronze ranked.

I will Duo with you and climb out and I can reward in skins per rank or monetary...

As in bronze to silver, silver to gold, gold to plat.

Looking for tips and coaching throughout gameplay... 

I normally jungle as Zac. 

Add me S1LAS

replies.body:
I don't duo, never will.

You wont succeed or get better if someone just "Boosts" you out of there.
or carries you. (That's actually against riots rules) 

I can spectate your games and see what your doing wrong.
And the focus will solely be on you.
It will teach you, what you are doing wrong and how YOU can fix it.

----

BRB looking at your match history to find obvious things.

I'll duo with you and i'll get you out of bronze. 
Add me :

iAkeno.

Right, I haven't spectated any games so i don't know specifics.

First of all, you die waaaaay too much. Great example in almost all of your games.

Watch these:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GhVHYNMr7cM

--

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z4cTEpSzZcM

------------------------------

As a jungler its your job to focus objectives, which you never seem to do in any game.
Pinks are nice, you've bought some.
Maybe a little more.

Try and get Towers > Dragons > Kills.
Don't chase or overextend for any.

If you gank a lane and it was somewhat successful, Tax the lane.
(Kill lane minions, get some extra gold and EXP)
Then if you can, push that wave.

If they tell you no, you can do two things.

Do it anyway- Tell them the lane will reset in your teams favor making it easier for you to gank them.
Don't- Leave as quickly as you can and either gank another lane, counter jungle (Only do this if you have vision or the enemy jungler is still dead.) or go back to farming your jungle or go back and buy items.

-----------------------------------

Upgrade your trinket at lvl 9-12
You dont do this enough.
As a support/Jungler get a sweeper/lens as quickly as you can.
Once you have a sightstone, or the Ward jungle item. Swap to sweeper, and upgrade it later.

-------------------------------------------

A lot of people have been in your position, first thing in order to improve or get better is Admitting that your not good at the game.
so far I've helped two summoners now reach Silver, without playing with them.
They did it on their own and learnt by themselves.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI
Why tax the lane? Isn't jungle the 2nd to last role to require gold? I'm asking not trying to pick flaws. I'm bronze 5.

Every role needs gold, Junglers need it to become tanky and contest for objectives easier.
It also helps push a wave or two into the enemy tower.

-----
What that does is prevent the enemy laner from receiving 1-2 lanes worth of gold.
Or forces the enemy jungler to hold that lane, making dragon-rift more easily gained.

By the end of it too, the lane resets. (As if minions are just spawning and they meet in the middle)

Yes, but isn't that denying say your ad farm? pf course you push the lane b4 you recall. Thats what the laners would do wouldn't they? So why does the jungle need to tax minions off a lane? I'd only thought if the laner wasn't able to do so would be the only reason.

ADC isnt gonna miss like 4 minions.
Its mainly just to push, deny enemy CS and reset the wave in favor of your laner.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=eVMTnAh8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-28T06:35:15.699+0000)

Thanks for the tips ! I was unaware that it's against their Terms for "boostin" thanks again and I will ty improve
That's all well and good, plenty of things and Actually good League youtubers you can watch to help pick up on some small things that you may have missed.

So now, S1LAS, after reading what Yasei Doubutsu posted, are you still willing to get out of bronze? Will require some effort. 

Other things you can do is hire a coach ([lol-coaching.com](http://lol-coaching.com) is one such site - i recommend Saiclone on that, he's very good), watching youtube higher rated players (for Zac I recommend watching TheOddOne, search for him) and you can also create a diary of your improvement and what you need to change.
Here is some other good advice that i found on these boards:

> [{quoted}](name=Main Line,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=xgp4AbnZ,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-04-26T13:13:43.263+0000)
>
> Do everything you can to **get towers and protect your own towers**. If you are in a situation where you cannot do this, then think about the baron/dragon.
> 
> Don't all rush to dragon when it spawns if you have 
> 
> 1) No vision
> 2) Your lanes are not pushing over halfway
> 3) Your jungler is miles away
> 4) Enemy team are all up and MIA (they are likely in the dragon pit already!)
> 
> Learn to give up dragons to re-acquire map pressure. Otherwise you'll just set yourself up to lose quickly.
> 
> And most of all, don't chase after 1 kill. You'll lose map pressure, losing towers. And towers win games in Season 6.

Good luck! Bronze is actually very easy to escape by having a little more game knowledge, and **how to handle people** skills. Another thing, I wish that all oce players under platinum watched those two videos by Yasei Doubutsu, because in essence, dynamic queue has made gold the new bronze.
